name: Video Poker - Game of Bounty
description:
-= Medieval Knights Meets Classic Video Poker =-

This app brings classic video poker to a modern audience with 4 beautifully themed card packs and an epic soundtrack. You, the player, will have unlimited credits in your quest to reach the top of the game center leaderboards. Make haste Adventurer, for your bounty awaits!

This App Features:
• Unlimited Free Play
• Epic Soundtrack
• Game Center Leaderboards
• Card Packs (3 Additional through IAP)
• Simple & Fun Design!

This game is intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at gaming does not imply success at real money gambling. If you have a gambling problem, please contact a qualified professional. Please play responsibly.

Enjoy,
Nick
